attributes.action: Make policy and run the Third Party Insurance Scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask for the Government to run the third party insurance scheme set at a rate similar to road taxing.  This will help the insured by not having to pay over the odds for Vehicle insurance charged by the insurance companies.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/roadtaxinsurance/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
